og.description: A Jackson doctor and a former hospital trustee have blasted St. John’s Medical Center’s recent hiring of physicians and surgeons, saying the move isn’t economically viable or in the best interests of the public.
og.title: Doctor hirings faulted on costs

article_metadata.keywords: st. john's medical center board of trustees,st. john's medical center,st. john’s medical center surgery,dr. brent blue,peter moyer,mike menolascino,christine turner,michael rosenberg,randy kjorstad,lou hochheiser,bruce hayse,george poore,michael tennican,health,top_story
